meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Laura Button Matthew Warren Bob Kennedy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6029.

td.p: Laura Button, an editor and proofreader from Alpharetta, Georgia
Matthew Warren, a computer engineer from Charleston, South Carolina
Bob Kennedy, a college linguistics instructor from Santa Barbara, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,800)

tr.td: KNOW YOUR RIGHTS
THIS & THAT
THE OFFICE WORKOUT
THE PRINCESS BRIDE
I'M GONNA "MAKE" IT!
(Alex: We want you to name the sport for us...)
YOU'LL NEED SOME COACHING

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The Sixth Amendment gives you the right to "enjoy" (yep, enjoy) "a speedy and public" one of these')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The Sixth Amendment gives you the right to "enjoy" (yep, enjoy) "a speedy and public" one of these

tr.td: Bob
Matthew
Laura

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Bob
Matthew
Laura
GEOGRAPHY
WE'RE GONNA NEED A BIGGER BOAT
LITERARY LETTER DROP
(Alex: We're going to drop one letter from the title of a well-known book or novel, and it'll give you something completely different. The clue, of course, will help you.)
PAT-POURRI
PLANTS & TREES
STRONG WORDS
